greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The sequence m(n) in A022905.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
J. M. Dover, On two OEIS conjectures, arXiv:1606.08033 [math.CO], 2016.
formula: a(n) = 3 * A033485(n-1) - 1 = (3/2) * A000123(n-1) - 1, n>1. Proved by Jeremy Dover. - _Ralf Stephan_, Dec 08 2004
mathematica: a[n_] := If[n == 1, 0, (3/2) a123[n-1] - 1]; Array[a, 50] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 04 2018 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
